item.title: Apple unveils iPhone 17, including first-ever iPhone Air
item.description: The product event also featured new versions of the Apple Watch and AirPods.

item.title: Israel told US military of plan to strike Hamas, but didn't say where: US official
item.description: The official said it "wasn't sufficient' to "adequately warn regional partners."

item.title: Firefighter dies while battling blaze at the Grand Canyon: Officials
item.description: A firefighter has died after suffering a "cardiac emergency" while battling a blaze in northern Arizona, officials said.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: GOP-led House Oversight Committee receives Epstein estate documents, 'birthday book'
item.description: Democrats on the committee have shared a photo they say is the page purportedly written by Donald Trump.
